title: MERN Stack Book Store
description: It is a web app demo for a Book Store Site. API created by using NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB. Frontend is created by using ReactJS, React Router, DaisyUI and TailwindCSS
technologies: MongoDB, ExpressJS, NodeJS, ReactJS, React Router, Firebase Authentication, DaisyUI, TailwindCSS, React Icons, SweetAlert2, SwiperJS

title: E-Commerce Demo App
description: It is a web app demo for an E-commerce Site. Converted from a figma design
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, NextJS, DaisyUI, Flowbite, API integration from local json file

title: Hashrid Company Landing Page (Figma to HTML, CSS, Vanila JS)
description: Hashrid is a company who works on Blockchain Development. It is their hardcoded landing page demo.
technologies: I used basic things here. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, responsive design for mobile and tablet

title: Landing Page Design of a Restaurant
description: It is a landing page demo for a restaurant. Converted from a figma design
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, ReactJS, API integration from local json file, DaisyUI

title: Social Event Management App
description: It is a web app demo for an event management company. The company which usually take contact for social events like wedding, baby shower etc
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, ReactJS, React Routing, Firebase Authentication, API integration from local json file, DaisyUI

title: Donation Campaign Website

title: Course Roaster App
description: It is just a sample of course selling apps. If you select any course, it will show total credit hour, course name, total price on the right card
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, ReactJS, API integration from local json file, DaisyUI

title: Job Portal Website
description: It is a web sample of job portal site. Go details of any featured job and click on apply now. You will be able to see the job you have appplied in the applied job option. You can filter based on remote and on-site job you have applied there
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, ReactJS, React Routing, Local Storage used as storing some data, API integration from local json file, DaisyUI

title: Blog Website
description: It is sample of a blog website.
technologies: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, ReactJS, React Routing, Local Storage used as storing some data, API integration from local json file, DaisyUI
